education.degree: Master of Science in Software Engineering

education.school: New York University, Tandon School of Engineering
education.degree: Preparatory Course for Graduate Studies in Computing

professional.title: Sr. Engineer
professional.sub_title: Credit System・Activation Service・Channel Digital Platform

projects.name: Money Tracker
projects.title: Expense Tracking Web App
projects.description: Money Tracker is an expense tracking web application that utilizes the MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) stack along with TypeScript and Storybook. The application provides various features, including expense records, expense category summaries, and dynamic updates.

projects.name: Voice Simulation Service
projects.title: Autism Website - Voice Simulation
projects.description: Voice Simulation Service is a component of the Autism Website that aims to enhance the reading and storytelling experience for children with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD). The service provides features such as story creation and updates, as well as story reading in different voices with support for volume control, play speed adjustment, and tone changing. It is built using Node.js, React, and Firebase - Cloud Firestore, with integration with murf.ai.

projects.name: Data Collection
projects.title: Timing-Based Browsing Vulnerable via Site Isolation
projects.description: Timing-Based Attack Data Collection utilizes HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, and Selenium to conduct end-to-end web scraping. The purpose is to collect the loading time of 300 URLs for three different scenarios: Not-Present (NP), Foreground (FG), and Background (BG).

projects.name: CMUSV One
projects.title: Meeting Room Reservation System
projects.description: CMUSV One is a login-required meeting room reservation microservice system that utilizes TypeScript, React, Express, Flask, and Node.js, with integration of SendGrid. The system offers several features, including meeting room reservation, search functionality for meeting rooms, calendar view, meeting notifications, and calendar sharing.

projects.name: FSEChat Room
projects.title: Real Time Chat Room Web App
projects.description: FSEChat is a registered required chat room web app using the standard web stack (HTML, CSS, JavaScript), Node.js with express.js framework, socket.io, and MYSQL. Features includes user authentication and messaging and implement with RESTful API services based on Object-Oriented Programming and MVC architecture.

projects.name: HOMIE
projects.title: Housework Management Web App
projects.description: HOMIE is a cloud-based app built with React, Redux, D3.js, and Firebase. Built member, group and task management and point reward feature with Firebase Authentication, Cloud Firestore, and Firebase Storage.

projects.name: STYLiSH
projects.title: eCommerce Clothes Shopping Site
projects.description: STYLISH is a fashion clothes e-commerce shop, implemented with HTML, CSS, and AJAX.  Added third party login features with Facebook and Google OAuth API. Developed the shopping cart feature combining Web Storage API and third-party payment service. Leveraged Socket.io to implement the realtime customer service.

projects.name: NS Watcher
projects.title: Android App Intro Website
projects.description: Developed and deployed the introduction website using HTML, CSS, and Javascript and optimized with RWD, SEO, and Google Analytics.
